profile.name: Rick Spence
profile.title: PROGRAM/PROJECT MANAGER
profile.description: Rick Spence is a highly accomplished and results-oriented Program/Project Manager with extensive experience in leading and delivering complex projects and programs within the Australian Defence Force and various government agencies.  His expertise spans end-to-end project management, risk mitigation, milestone achievement, and resource coordination.  A highly organized and detail-oriented leader, Rick possesses exceptional communication and negotiation skills, effectively collaborating with internal teams, vendors, and stakeholders to achieve common goals.  His proven ability to manage multiple teams, mentor junior staff, and implement Agile methodologies (SAFe 6.0) demonstrates his leadership capabilities and commitment to delivering exceptional results.  Rick's ambition and career focus align perfectly with opportunities to contribute to organizational success while furthering his own professional development.
profile.description2: With a strong background in digital transformation, cloud computing (Microsoft Azure, AWS), and cyber security, Rick consistently delivers projects on time and within budget.  His experience encompasses various project methodologies, including Agile, Scrum, and SAFe, and he is adept at utilizing tools such as Jira, Confluence, and Power BI.  Rick's contributions have included building PMO structures, developing LACE frameworks, and implementing DevOps environments. He has a proven track record of improving organizational efficiency, enhancing cyber security maturity levels, and creating innovative solutions to complex challenges.  His experience working with diverse teams, including APS, ADF, and contractors, highlights his adaptability and ability to foster collaborative working environments. Rick is seeking a challenging role where he can leverage his skills and experience to contribute to a dynamic and forward-thinking organization.
